title: Mystery Gift Technical Issue
body:
I have a somewhat pressing issue that the support center can't help me with, and am seeking advice.
The gifting center sent a mystery gift to a completely different user than one I had selected. The basic breakdown of events is 
1.) lost a bet to a friend and had to send a mystery gift to him in order to settle it 
2.) opened the gifting center and clicked on his name (420x...) 
3.) Clicked on the red "Purchase RP" button, purchased $5 worth. 
4.) I'm still on the same page for mystery gift, which I had selected for my friend. 
5.) I clicked to purchase the mystery gift and confirmed it. 
6.) "Congratulations, you just sent a Rammus skin to 'AsianWes...'"

I omitted the endings of their usernames for privacy purposes. Although they were somewhat close on a top-down list, there was still a good 3 friends between them, and I know I clicked on the correct user. What can I do? The support tickets don't have an option for refunds. How likely is it that I will even get a refund if I do submit it under a different category? It's kinda upsetting that I just wasted $5 on a technical error that I had no control over.

replies.body:
I can't make any promises, but if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (first category is fine) and provide a link to this boards post within the ticket, we'll see what we can do.

Let me know if you run into any issues submitting your ticket.
